QuestData.Title: Clearing Out Before Cleaning Up
QuestData.Description: Here's the situation.$b$bWe need to get this salvage operation moving ASAP, but the ship went down right in the middle of the wasp nests.$b$bThe ugly bugs are all over the place, and I can't call my team in here to start work until they're taken care of.$b$bGo kill as many of 'em as you can and I'll cut you in on some of the haul.
QuestData.CompletionText: I still see a mess of wasps down there.$b$bWe need to clear those wasps out before I can get the salvage operation started.
QuestData.RewardText: That's how ye do it! As soon as my crew gets here we can start work.$b$bHere's your pay. Thanks for doing the job.
